list.name: Changes
list.comment:
//APP SIDE 1. Downloaded project and imported in android studio. 2. Created XML layout using Linear layout, Relative layout, scrollview, videoview, textview and imageviews. 3. Added internet permission in manifest. 4. Created model class to get json data. 5. Created interface to make Get request to get video list. 6. Implemented function to parse JSON API data for the videos. 7. Implmented logic for previous,next and play pause button.
SERVER SIDE 1. Installed yarn and node using instruction provided. 2. Code provided by you is working fine but while parsing i have checked that one of the link of the video is wrong.
link provided by you on as first item of the list
"https://d140vvwqovffrf.cloudfront.net/media/5e852de33c8e4/720.mp4"
when you will hit this url it will display access denied message because some text is missing in this url so the correct URL is
"https://d140vvwqovffrf.cloudfront.net/media/5e852de33c8e4/full/720.mp4"
I have checked the second item of the json array it contains full/720 that is missing in first item.
3. I have changed the first link in the server\src\data\videos.ts
from "https://d140vvwqovffrf.cloudfront.net/media/5e852de33c8e4/720.mp4" to "https://d140vvwqovffrf.cloudfront.net/media/5e852de33c8e4/full/720.mp4"
now it is working.
